comments: The ultraviolet spectra were obtained from samples vacuum-sealed into dry quartz cells (1- and 10-cm. path length), using Perkin-Elmer 350 and Optika instruments
name: tetraboron tetrachloride
citation: A.G. Massey and D.S. Urch, "The ultraviolet spectrum and electronic structure of tetraboron tetrachloride, B
